beats.speaker: Presenter
beats.text: Welcome to the future of presentation design with MulmoCast, a groundbreaking multi-modal presentation platform. This tool is purpose-built for the generative AI era, stepping beyond the limitations of traditional tools like PowerPoint and Keynote, which were created for human authors decades ago.

beats.speaker: Presenter
beats.text: Today, content is often generated by large language models, or LLMs, and they require a native environment that is optimized for their unique capabilities. MulmoCast is designed to meet this need, offering a seamless environment for AI-generated content creation and presentation.

beats.speaker: Presenter
beats.text: What sets MulmoCast apart is its ability to empower AI to automatically create and deliver rich, multi-modal presentations. Whether it's slides, videos, podcasts, documents, or comics, MulmoCast uses our open presentation language, MulmoScript, to bring your ideas to life.
